body.p: The Master Files support is also useful for project level validation and transformation. When you hover the mouse cursor over a file in the Master Files directory, displays the Validate and Transform buttons at the right of the file. Select one of these buttons to run a transformation, or validation scenario. In case the current node is selected, executes a batch transformation and validation. In case the current node is not selected, executes the validation and transformation for the current node only. The behavior of these actions is the same as the behavior of the transformation actions available in the contextual menu. The tooltip of the Validate and Transform buttons displays the associated scenarios that you can execute.When you hover the mouse cursor over the Master Files directory itself, apart from the Validate and Transform buttons, displays a Help button. Either click this button, or press F1 on your keyboard to open the Help section regrading the Master Files support.
